rooms.description: Entry hall with minimalistic design and large glass fa√ßade to allow natural light.
Open-plan living area integrated with dining space, with ample ambient lighting for relaxation.
Spacious minimalist kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and clean lines; adjacent to the living room for an open-plan feel.
Guest bedroom featuring a large balcony overlooking the garden, minimalistic decor.
Second guest bedroom with its own balcony; designed for privacy and relaxation.
Compact study or home office area, strategically placed in accordance with Vastu for productivity.
Service space including laundry and storage, designed to be easily accessible from the kitchen.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden, designed for comfort and privacy.
Additional bedroom for family members, featuring a balcony for fresh air and relaxation.
Fourth bedroom designed in minimalist style with emphasis on natural light through large windows.
Open courtyard at ground level designed as a garden space; integrates natural ventilation and sunlight, adhering to Vastu principles.
